alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nassau, northern St. Johns and eastern Duval Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 329 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Yulee to near World Golf Village. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Fernandina Beach, Jacksonville International Arpt, Unf, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Arlington, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach and Atlantic Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
